guides.title: Control Audience and Tagging
guides.description: Manage who can see your posts and who can tag you in photos.

steps.title: Open Privacy Settings
steps.instruction: Tap your profile icon, then 'Settings and privacy'.

steps.title: Navigate to Privacy
steps.instruction: Tap 'Privacy and safety' > 'Audience and tagging'.

steps.title: Protect Your Posts
steps.instruction: Toggle on 'Protect your posts' to make your account private (only approved followers see your posts).

steps.title: Control Photo Tagging
steps.instruction: Under 'Photo tagging', choose who can tag you: 'Everyone' or 'Only people you follow'.

guides.title: Manage Location Sharing
guides.description: Control location information attached to your posts.

steps.title: Access Location Settings
steps.instruction: Go to Settings and privacy > Privacy and safety.

steps.title: Disable Location Information
steps.instruction: Tap 'Location information' and toggle off 'Add location information to your posts'.

steps.title: Remove Location History
steps.instruction: Tap 'Delete all location information' to remove location data from past posts.

guides.title: Control Message Settings
guides.description: Manage who can send you direct messages on X.

steps.title: Open Direct Messages Settings
steps.instruction: Go to Settings and privacy > Privacy and safety > Direct Messages.

steps.title: Control Message Requests
steps.instruction: Toggle 'Allow message requests from everyone' on or off based on your preference.

steps.title: Filter Message Requests
steps.instruction: Enable 'Filter low-quality messages' to reduce spam in your message requests.

steps.title: Manage Read Receipts
steps.instruction: Toggle 'Show read receipts' off if you don't want others to know when you've read their messages.

guides.title: Configure Privacy and Safety
guides.description: Review and configure comprehensive privacy and safety settings.

steps.title: Access Safety Settings
steps.instruction: Navigate to Settings and privacy > Privacy and safety.

steps.title: Manage Content Preferences
steps.instruction: Under 'Your posts', control who can reply to your posts and mention you.

steps.title: Review Muted and Blocked Accounts
steps.instruction: Check 'Muted' and 'Blocked accounts' lists to manage unwanted interactions.

steps.title: Configure Spaces Settings
steps.instruction: Control who can see your Spaces listening activity in the Spaces section.

guides.title: Enable Two-Factor Authentication
guides.description: Add an extra security layer to your X account.

steps.title: Open Security Settings
steps.instruction: Go to Settings and privacy > Security and account access > Security.

steps.title: Select Two-Factor Authentication
steps.instruction: Tap 'Two-factor authentication'.

steps.title: Choose Method
steps.instruction: Select your preferred method: 'Authentication app' (recommended), 'Text message', or 'Security key'.

steps.title: Complete Setup
steps.instruction: Follow the on-screen instructions to complete the 2FA setup for your chosen method.

guides.title: Manage Discoverability
guides.description: Control how people can find and discover your X account.

steps.title: Open Discoverability Settings
steps.instruction: Navigate to Settings and privacy > Privacy and safety > Discoverability and contacts.

steps.title: Control Email/Phone Lookup
steps.instruction: Toggle off 'Let people who have your email address find you on X' and same for phone number.

steps.title: Manage Contact Syncing
steps.instruction: Review 'Sync address book contacts' and disable if you don't want X to access your contacts.
